mapper.insert: insert into tbl_program (pcourse, roomname, torder, opendate, closedate, maximum) values (#{pcourse}, #{roomname} , #{torder}, #{opendate},#{closedate},#{maximum})
mapper.update: update tbl_program set pcourse = #{pcourse}, roomname = #{roomname}, torder=#{torder}, opendate = #{opendate}, closedate =#{closedate}, maximum=#{maximum} where pno=#{pno}
